desc: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.
notes: Does not react on nearby spell immune units. If already targeted unit turns spell immune, attempts to deal damage on contact.

lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.
name: arc_warden_spark_wraith

desc: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells, except items that drop on death. Tempest Double decrements Black King Bar charges when the item is used. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns and cannot copy consumables.

lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.
